line.text: Far away, in distant volcanic lands of Draconia, a young lone traveler seeks to find his place in the world.
After a long travel he stumbles upon a small, almost deserted town...
A miserable death has befallen the brave Hero. The last hope of the dying town is gone.
Unable to access the orbs knowledge the Knight makes a fruitless attempt to forcefully obtain its secrets. The town is wiped out in the process and no memory of it perserveres.
Facing the Knight's might the Hero looses his determination and flees. He leaves the town behind unable to change its fate, seeking instead to help others and reclaim his honor.
Without help the town ultimately succumbs to deterioration which leaves it vulnerable to the Knights whim. Lacking strength nor hope, the town gets wiped out in search for the secret.
Under the Knight's corrupting inflence the Hero decides to seek the power hidden within the orb. They join forces and sweep the Draconian lands in search for the orb's secret.
The town stood no chance against their combined strength yielding almost instantly. The lone survivor of the carnage has sworn revenge on the Hero for his betrayal
After a grueling fight the Hero had the Knight at his mercy. However, as the final blow was coming the Knight covered himself with the orb in desperation shattering it instantly.
Condensed energy of the orb dispersed violently killing the Knight instantly and knocking the hero back. Badly bruised but alive he makes his way back to the town.
Without the essence the town slowly succumbs to natural deterioration eventually becoming deserted. The hero left with the few remaining Draconians helping them in search of a new place to live.
The merciful hero held up the orb victoriously. With the Knight gone and defeated the hero left the crumbling walls of the castle behind and returned to the village.
With the essence returned the town slowly began rebuilding eventually returning to and even surpassing its former glory. Draconians never forgot that it was a human that saved them that day.
The merciful hero held up the orb victoriously. But as he did something strange started happening. The orb melted in his hands covering him completely in a vivid and thick substance
The essence contained within the orb has found a new worthy host. What emerged was an amazing creature.
In his new form the Hero decided to stay in the village and use his new strength to rebuild and protect the small town and its people.
